title: Cant Login PBE

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
When i want login i get this picture a very long time i think this will fix but it wont.
When i wanna login i get this picture: http://imgur.com/a/REW5j

replies.body: have you been accepted to the pbe? its a different server with different accounts.

Thats my friends account who gaved it to me bcs he stops playing and im played on that 1-2 weeks and just i cant login because username and password isnt good idk why.. Account is on my email i can change the pw i know the username so i dont know where is the problem :( it seems like the account was deleted or i dont know :(
well after you wrote this you wont get it anyways. accountsharing is not allowed so you will have to apply for an account yourself

It doesn't look like the account you're posting from has been approved for the PBE.  In case the account you're trying to log into is tied to another live account, our account recovery team can help get you to the right one through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416).  Fill it out, and we'll get back to you!
Im written to the account recovery form. Account is on mine mail and im waiting for support response me.
